TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DecimalType extends System.Object

summary.span: Esta clase ha quedado obsoleta en Visual Basic 2005.

span.span: This class has been deprecated as of Visual Basic 2005.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esta clase proporciona métodos para manipular los datos que representan potencialmente un `Decimal` valor.This class provides methods for manipulating data that potentially represents a `Decimal` value.
